challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Ni neska nintzen, baina orain etxekoandrea naiz.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: I was a girl, but now I am a housewife.

challenges.formattedSolution: Ni neska nintzen, baina orain etxekoandrea naiz.
I was a girl, but now I am a housewife.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Ni ikaslea nintzen, baina orain apaiza naiz.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: I was a student, but now I am a priest.

challenges.formattedSolution: Ni ikaslea nintzen, baina orain apaiza naiz.
I was a student, but now I am a priest.
